thumb: IIb}}</ref> and his feet were shod in gold.<ref name="coming">{{S

320px: P2a}}</ref> Oromë was riding and hunting east near the [[Orocarni]] when Nahar gave a great neighing and stood still.  Wondering, Oromë too went still and heard afar the singing of many voices.  Thus Nahar alerted his master to the existence of the awakened [[Elves]].  Later, in {{YT
column5: P2g}}</ref> when the hosts of the [[Eldalië]] left [[Cuiviénen]], Oromë rode Nahar at their head.<ref name="coming"/>
